ContentDistributionView.name: ContentDistributionView
ContentDistributionView.description: Represents information about views of a shared document.

DistributionId.description: ID of the content delivery that the document is part of.

IsDownload.description: true if the shared document is downloaded; false if the shared document is viewed.

IsInternal.description: true if the shared document is viewed by a user in the same organization; false if viewed by an external user.

ParentViewId.description: ID of this instance of accessing the shared document.
